thread.title: Satisfied customer!
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Satisfied customer!

author: Satisfied customer!
title: Satisfied customer!
text: I got the weboost amplifier and installed it myself..(pretty self explanatory) except for the way it actually mounted to the pole. I had to find a small treated board to make it work. But other than that the installation was easy. As far as the real test...I had normally a bar that allowed me text here in the house before..But not make a call or really allow me to get on the internet. I went up on the roof and found the best spot with my phone..Got it all mounted up and ended up with 3 and 4 bars there close to the amplifier and 4G LTE. Even in the next room I get a couple bars. The best news for us was basically the signal was good enough to get rid of our land line and our satellite internet. Roughly a $125/mo. savings right there. So far..It's been well worth the investment...And really..For us the longer we have it the more we'll save!
